# Chamber of Seeing (WondArch)
## Overview
**Chamber of Seeing:** Any invisible creature that enters this stronghold space instantly becomes visible. Only creatures with no visible form, such as invisible stalkers, remain unseen.

*Caster Level:* 5th; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Invisibility Purge (Spell)|invisibility purge]]**; Market Price:* 7,500 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 74
